circumstances: After passengers deplaned at Mexico Airport, Missouri, the pilot was returning to his base at Lebanon-Floyd W. Jones Airport. On approach, the pilot initiated acrobatics maneuvers when he lost control of the airplane that crashed in a field. The aircraft was destroyed upon impact and the pilot, sole on board, was killed.
probable_cause:
Loss of control after the pilot exercised poor judgment. The following factors were reported:
- Improper operation of flight controls, 
- Failed to maintain flying speed, 
- Unwarranted low flying, 
- Failed to follow approved procedures, 
- Low level acrobatics over airport, 
- Stall following recovery from roll.
